document_data.name: Kurth
document_data.Description: Kurth had a black beard and was hot-tempered.
document_data.Possessions: He lived within [[Kurth Tower]] in [[Closeguard Island]], and was said to have a ''[[teleport ring]]'' that could whisk him there instantly. He also possessed a ''[[ring of regeneration]]''.
document_data.Relationships: Ironically, Kurth was also a former friend of [[Nasher]] before the two became bitter enemies. According to rumors, their fallout was largely due to the two's mutual affection for [[Ophala Cheldarstorn]].
